title: I'm Gonna Sing
lyrics:
Lift every voice and sing
Till earth and heaven ring
Ring with the harmonies of Liberty
Let our rejoicing rise
High as the list'ning skies

Let it resound loud as the rolling sea



Now I'm gonna sing a song

Full of the faith that the dark past has taught us

Said I'm gonna sing, sing a song

Full of the hope that the present has brought us

I'm gonna sing, sing a song, yeah

I'm gonna lift my voice and I'm gonna sing

Sing a song, yeah

I'm gonna lift my voice and I'm gonna sing



Sing a song

Full of the faith that the dark past has taught us

I'm gonna sing, sing a song

Full of the hope that the present has brought us



Facing the rising sun

Of our new day begun

Let us march on till victory is won
